document_data.name: Ulu Knife
document_data.mainbody: An '''ulu knife''', or simply '''ulu''', was a variety of [[knife]] and a versatile tool used in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: An ulu was a small blade sized to be used with one hand. It had a handle in the center, sometimes made of [[scrimshaw]], with a blade affixed to it in a half-moon shape. The knife was used by rocking it back and forth, easily cutting through whatever it was used on.
document_data.History: As of the late 1480s [[DR]], ulu knives were commonly used across the [[Ten Towns]] of Icewind Dale, and were often considered to be useful trinkets.
